;NOTE:  You must "Reload Text" (or restart) for changes to be active.

;Here you can add IP address to be banned.  Adding part of an IP will
;ban anyone STARTING with that IP so it's possible to ban entire subnets
;which is required to really ban a dialup guy in most cases.

;You can also add a comment so you can remember why you banned it.

ban|66.66.66.66|This will stop satan from playing, always a good idea.
